articles.description: Follow live text, Test Match Special commentary and in-play clips from day one of the fifth Ashes Test between England and Australia at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: Ashes build-up: England look to deny Australia series win at The Oval

articles.description: Nigeria come from behind to beat Australia and leave the co-hosts facing a battle to qualify for the last 16 of the Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Nigeria come from behind to beat co-hosts Australia

articles.description: Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson joins Saudi Arabian club Al-Ettifaq in a deal worth £12m plus add-ons.
articles.title: Liverpool captain Henderson joins Al-Ettifaq

articles.description: Captain Lindsey Horan comes to the rescue of defending champions the United States after the Netherlands threaten an upset at the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Horan denies Netherlands famous World Cup win

articles.description: Jordan Henderson confirms Liverpool exit before expected move to Al-Ettifaq and an update on the world-record bid for Kylian Mbappe from Al-Hilal plus more transfer news and gossip.
articles.title: Transfer latest: Henderson confirms Liverpool exit and Mbappe update

articles.description: England defender Lucy Bronze says it would not matter if they won the Women's World Cup with 1-0 scorelines in every game.
articles.title: Bronze happy to take 1-0 as Lionesses seek last 16

articles.description: Watch Harry Brooks' best shots as he reaches 50 not out off 44 balls on day one of the fifth Ashes Test at the Oval.
articles.title: Brook hits 50 off 44 balls - best shots

articles.description: England lose Ben Duckett, Zak Crawley and Joe Root to go from 62-0 to 73-3 in the space of three-and-a-half overs on day one of the fifth Ashes Test.
articles.title: England lose three wickets for 11 runs

articles.description: Portugal earn a face off with reigning champions United States for a place in the last 16 of the Women's World Cup with an impressive win over Vietnam.
articles.title: Portugal set up USA showdown with win over Vietnam

articles.description: Jude Bellingham scores in a man-of-the-match performance as Real Madrid beat Manchester United in a pre-season friendly in Houston.
articles.title: Bellingham scores as Real Madrid beat Man Utd
